com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist
Class CFEContentAssist

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist.CFEContentAssist
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist.IContentAssistProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
CFContentAssist, DefaultTagAssistContributor
public abstract class CFEContentAssist
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist.IContentAssistProcessor

Author:
Oliver Tupman This is the abstract base class for all of the CFE content assist processors. It provides a number of useful methods for the derived classes, though I suspect they could all probably be refactored into a utility class.

getPartitionItems

public static java.util.ArrayList getPartitionItems(org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocument document,
                                                    org.eclipse.jface.text.ITypedRegion partition,
                                                    int offset)
This method essentially tokenises a string having eliminated any unwanted characters.

Parameters:
document - The source document
partition - The partition info where the offset lies
offset - The offset within the document
Returns:
A list of items that are space-deliminated.

finaliseProposal

public static org.eclipse.jface.text.contentassist.CompletionProposal finaliseProposal(int offset,
                                                                                       short type,
                                                                                       int currentlen,
                                                                                       java.lang.String name,
                                                                                       java.lang.String display,
                                                                                       java.lang.String help)
Gets the proposal ready. Sets up the image, the text to insert into the text, and finally returns the completed proposal.

Parameters:
offset - - offset in the document
type - - type of thing we're making a proposal for
currentlen - - length that we'd need to insert if the user selected the proposal
name - - name of the proposal
display - - string to display
help - - the help associated with this proposal
Returns:
- the completed, indented, image'd proposal
See Also:
ICompletionProposal
